sentences.english: The country is only five years older than me. Its grey hairs have not yet begun to show.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家比我大五岁，白头发还没开始长出来。

sentences.english: Would like to have one mind, not of Baekdu from.
sentences.chinese: 愿得一心人，白头不相离。

sentences.english: The US declared that the  eagle was its national bird in 1782.
His white hair was in sharp contrast to (with) his dark skin.
sentences.chinese: 他的白头发和他的黑皮肤形成了鲜明的对照。

sentences.english: Take care of me when I get old; you too will get old.
sentences.chinese: 当我老去时请特别照顾我，你也有一天会白头。

sentences.english: We know that [the eagles] have always fed on dead marine animals.
sentences.chinese: 我们知道，白头海雕一直以海洋动物的尸体为食。

sentences.english: I'm sure they'll be very happy and grow old together.
sentences.chinese: 他们肯定会幸福美满，白头偕老。

sentences.english: It is also mentioned in South Korea's national anthem.
sentences.chinese: 南韩的国歌中也提到了白头山。

sentences.english: So the wintering period of Hooded Crane at Chongming Dongtan is about 5 months.
sentences.chinese: 因此，白头鹤在崇明东滩的越冬期约为5个月。

sentences.english: Why Stay Married to a Lifestyle?
sentences.chinese: 为什么要和一种生活方式白头偕老？

sentences.english: Other signs may require a lot of understanding and compromise.
sentences.chinese: 其他星座要想和水瓶座白头偕老需要很多理解和妥协。

sentences.english: She has already had a few white hairs.
Whenas I wish you both a lifetime of happiness.
sentences.chinese: 然而我还是祝愿妳们白头到老，幸福美满。

sentences.english: On teenage head long now and then 10 come is hair of root hoary head what to vitamin lack?
sentences.chinese: 青少年头上偶尔长十来根白头发是缺少什么维生素？

sentences.english: We're all very fair-skinned and dark-haired.
sentences.chinese: 我们都是皮肤很白头发颜色很深。

sentences.english: In his on the bike is, I saw him floating in the wind of hair.
sentences.chinese: 在他骑上自行车是，我看见他飘在风里的白头发。
